 29744                                  
 29745                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29746                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 29747                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29748                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 29749                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 29750                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 29751                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29752                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29753                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 29754                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 29755                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 29756                                  ;      ...
 29757                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 29758                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29759                                  
 29760                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 29761                                  AddrToUmb:
 29762                                  	; 01/01/2023
 29763                                  	;push	cx
 29764                                  	;push	dx
 29765 00002CF4 06                      	push	es
 29766                                  
 29767 00002CF5 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 29768                                  
 29769 00002CF7 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 29770 00002CFA 722F                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 29771                                  
 29772 00002CFC 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax		; ES = first UMB segment
 29773 00002CFE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 29774                                  
 29775                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29776                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 29777                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 29778                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 29779                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29780                                  
 29781 00002D00 8CC0                    atu10:	mov	ax,es
 29782 00002D02 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 29783 00002D04 7328                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 29784                                  
 29785 00002D06 E8DBFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 29786 00002D09 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 29787                                  
 29788 00002D0B 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 29789                                  atu20:	
 29790 00002D0C 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29791 00002D10 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 29792 00002D12 740C                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29793                                  
 29794                                  	;NextMCB es, ax
 29795                                  
 29796 00002D14 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 29797                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29798 00002D16 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29799 00002D1B 40                      	inc     ax
 29800 00002D1C 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 29801                                  	
 29802 00002D1E EBE0                    	jmp	short atu10
 29803                                  
 29804                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29805                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 29806                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 29807                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29808                                  
 29809                                  atu30:	
 29810 00002D20 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 29811 00002D22 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29812 00002D27 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 29813 00002D29 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 29814                                  atuE:	
 29815 00002D2B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 29816 00002D2D 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 29817                                  atuX:	
 29818 00002D2E 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 29819                                  	
 29820 00002D30 07                      	pop	es	
 29821                                  	; 01/01/2023
 29822                                  	;pop	dx
 29823                                  	;pop	cx
 29824 00002D31 C3                      	retn

 29826                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29827                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 29828                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 29829                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 29830                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 29831                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29832                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 29833                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 29834                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29835                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29836                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29837                                  
 29838                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 29839                                  convUMB:
 29840 00002D32 2E833E[282C]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 29841 00002D38 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 29842 00002D3A E8B7FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 29843                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 29844                                  	;jne	short cu10
 29845                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 29846                                  	; 01/01/2023
 29847 00002D3D 40                      	inc	ax
 29848 00002D3E 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 29849 00002D40 48                      	dec	ax
 29850                                  cu10:	
 29851 00002D41 C3                      	retn

 29877                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29878                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 29879                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29880                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29881                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 29882                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 29883                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29884                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 29885                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29886                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 29887                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0.  That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 29888                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 29889                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 29890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29891

 29901

 29906                                  	;jmp	short llX
 29907 00002D4D C3                      	retn
 29908                                  ll10:	
 29909 00002D4E 08C0                    	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 29910                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 29911                                  
 29912 00002D50 75F9                    	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29913 00002D52 C3                      	retn
 29914                                  
 29915                                  	;mov	al,1
 29916                                  	;clc
 29917                                  ;llX:
 29918                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 29919                                  	;retn

 30301 00002E16 C3                      	retn
 30302                                  
 30303                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30304                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30305                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30306                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30307                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30308                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30309                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30310                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30311                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30312                                  
 30313                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30314                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 30315                                  findUMB:
 30316                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30317                                  	;push	ax
 30318                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30319 00002E17 51                      	push	cx ; *
 30320                                  	;push	dx
 30321                                  
 30322 00002E18 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30323                                  
 30324 00002E1A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30325                                  
 30326 00002E1C E8B8FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30327 00002E1F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30328 00002E21 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30329                                  
 30330                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30331                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30332                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30333                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30334                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30335                                  
 30336                                  fu10:	
 30337 00002E23 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30338 00002E25 741B                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30339                                  
 30340 00002E27 E8BAFE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30341 00002E2A 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 30342                                  
 30343 00002E2C 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30344                                  fu20:	
 30345 00002E2D 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30346 00002E31 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30347 00002E33 740C                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30348                                  
 30349                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30350 00002E35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30351                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30352 00002E37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30353 00002E3C 40                      	inc     ax
 30354 00002E3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30355                                  
 30356 00002E3F EBE2                    	jmp	short fu10
 30357                                  fuE:	
 30358 00002E41 F9                      	stc
 30359                                  fuX:
 30360                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30361                                  	;pop	dx
 30362                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30363 00002E42 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 30364                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30365 00002E43 C3                      	retn
 30366                                  
 30367                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30368                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30369                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30370                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30371                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30372                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30373                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30374                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30375                                  
 30376                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30377                                  BigFree:
 30378                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30379                                  	;push	bx
 30380 00002E44 51                      	push	cx
 30381                                  
 30382 00002E45 E8CFFF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30383 00002E48 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30384                                  
 30385 00002E4A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30386 00002E4C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30387                                  
 30388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30389                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30390                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30391                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30393                                  
 30394                                  bf10:	
 30395 00002E4E E893FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30396 00002E51 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 30397                                  
 30398                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30399 00002E53 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30400 00002E59 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 30401                                  
 30402 00002E5B 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30403                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30404 00002E5F 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 30405 00002E61 7F04                    	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30406                                  
 30407 00002E63 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30408                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30409 00002E65 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 30410                                  
 30411 00002E67 26A00000                bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30412 00002E6B 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30413 00002E6D 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30414                                  
 30415                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30416 00002E6F 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30417                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30418 00002E71 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30419 00002E76 40                      	inc     ax
 30420 00002E77 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30421                                  
 30422 00002E79 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 30423                                  
 30424 00002E7B 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30425 00002E7D 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30426 00002E7F 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30427 00002E81 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30428                                  bfE:	
 30429 00002E83 F9                      	stc
 30430                                  bfX:
 30431 00002E84 59                      	pop	cx
 30432                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30433                                  	;pop	bx
 30434 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 30435                                  
 30436                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30437                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30438                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30439                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30440                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30441                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30442                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30443                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30444                                  
 30445                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30446                                  
 30447                                  isSpecified:
 30448                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30449                                  	;push	ax
 30450                                  
 30451 00002E86 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 30452 00002E88 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 30453                                  
 30454                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30455                                  	;
 30456                                  	;push	ds
 30457                                  	;push	cs
 30458                                  	;pop	ds
 30459                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30460                                  	;pop	ds
 30461                                  	
 30462                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30463                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30464                                  	; ds = cs
 30465 00002E8A 8A87[BA1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30466                                  
 30467 00002E8E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30468                                  
 30469                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30470 00002E90 58                      	pop	ax
 30471 00002E91 C3                      	retn
 30472                                  
 30473                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30474                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30475                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30476                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30477                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30478                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30479                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30480                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30481                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30482                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30483                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30484                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30485                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30486                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30487                                  
 30488                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30489                                  
 30490                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30491                                  
 30492                                  shrinkMCB:
 30493                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 30494                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30495                                  	;push	bx
 30496 00002E92 51                      	push	cx
 30497 00002E93 06                      	push	es
 30498                                  
 30499 00002E94 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30500                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30501                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30502                                  
 30503 00002E96 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30504                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30505 00002E9B 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 30506                                  
 30507 00002E9D 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30508                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30509                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30510                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30511                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30512                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 30513                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30514 00002EA0 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 30515 00002EA2 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30516                                  
 30517 00002EA4 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30518                                  	
 30519                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30520                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30521 00002EA9 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 30522                                  
 30523 00002EAB 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30524 00002EB0 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30525                                  
 30526 00002EB6 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 30527 00002EB8 40                      	inc	ax
 30528 00002EB9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30529                                  
 30530 00002EBB 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 30531 00002EBD 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 30532                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30533                                  	; ax > 0
 30534 00002EBF 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30535                                  
 30536                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30537 00002EC0 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30538                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30539 00002EC5 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30540                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30541                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30542                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30543                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30544                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30545                                  
 30546                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30547 00002EC9 E8B601                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30548                                  
 30549                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30550                                  	; cf=0
 30551                                  	;clc
 30552                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30553                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30554                                  smE:	
 30555                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30556                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30557                                  	;stc
 30558                                  smX:	
 30559                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 30560 00002ECC 07                      	pop	es
 30561 00002ECD 59                      	pop	cx
 30562                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30563                                  	;pop	bx
 30564 00002ECE C3                      	retn
 30565                                  
 30566                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30567                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30568                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30569                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30570                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30571                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30572                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30573                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30574                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30575                                  ;
 30576                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30577                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30578                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30579                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30580                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30581                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30582                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30583                                  ;       Endif
 30584                                  ;    Endif
 30585                                  ; Endif
 30586                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30587                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30588                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30589                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30590                                  ;    ENDIF
 30591                                  ; ENDIF
 30592                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30593                                  
 30594                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30595                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 30596                                  _hideUMB_:
 30597                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30598                                  	; ds = cs
 30599                                  
 30600                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30601                                  	;push	bx
 30602                                  	;push	dx
 30603 00002ECF 06                      	push	es
 30604                                  
 30605 00002ED0 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 30606 00002ED2 E8B1FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30607 00002ED5 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 30608                                  
 30609 00002ED7 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30610 00002ED9 E868FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30611 00002EDC 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30612                                  
 30613 00002EDE 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30614 00002EDF 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30615 00002EE1 E8ACFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30616 00002EE4 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30617                                  
 30618 00002EE5 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30619 00002EE7 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30620                                  
 30621 00002EE9 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30622 00002EEB 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 30623                                  
 30624 00002EED 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30625 00002EEF E8F2FC                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30626 00002EF2 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 30627                                  hu_10:	
 30628                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30629                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 30630                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30631                                  ;isTiny:
 30632                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 30633                                  	;or	al,al
 30634 00002EF4 800E[B61F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 30635 00002EF9 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 30636                                  
 30637 00002EFB E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30638 00002EFE 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30639                                  
 30640 00002F00 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 30641 00002F02 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30642                                  
 30643 00002F04 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30644 00002F06 E87DFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30645 00002F09 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30646                                  
 30647 00002F0B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 30648                                  hu_30:	
 30649 00002F0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 30650                                  
 30651 00002F0F E898FE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30652                                  
 30653 00002F12 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30654 00002F14 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30655                                  
 30656 00002F16 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30657 00002F18 E8E1FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30658                                  hu_X:	
 30659 00002F1B 07                      	pop	es
 30660                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30661                                  	;pop	dx
 30662                                  	;pop	bx
 30663 00002F1C C3                      	retn
 30664                                  
 30665                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30666                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30667                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30668                                  ; Entry:  None
 30669                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30670                                  ; Error:  None
 30671                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30673                                  
 30674                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30675

 30678                                  	;push	ax

 30697 00002F33 740C                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30698                                  
 30699                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30700 00002F35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30701                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30702 00002F37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30703 00002F3C 40                      	inc     ax
 30704 00002F3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30705

 30707                                  ufX:	
 30708 00002F41 07                      	pop	es
 30709                                  	; 03/01/2023
 30710                                  	;pop	ax
 30711 00002F42 C3                      	retn

 30713                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30749                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30787 00002F93 A0[B91F]                	mov	al,[UmbLoad] 	
 30788                                  
 30789 00002F96 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30790 00002F98 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30791                                  
 30792 00002F9A E83AFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30793 00002F9D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30794 00002F9F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30795                                  
 30796                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30797                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30798                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30799                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30800                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30801

 30803 00002FA4 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 30804                                  
 30805 00002FA6 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30806                                  fum20:	
 30807 00002FA7 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30808 00002FA9 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30809                                  
 30810                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30811 00002FAB 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30812 00002FB1 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30813                                  
 30814 00002FB3 E8B8FF                  	call	frezMCB
 30815                                  fum30:	
 30816 00002FB6 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30817 00002FBA 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30818 00002FBC 740C                    	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30819                                  
 30820                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30821 00002FBE 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30822                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]

 30824 00002FC5 40                      	inc     ax
 30825 00002FC6 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30826                                  	
 30827 00002FC8 EBD7                    	jmp	short fum10
 30828                                  
 30829 00002FCA 07                      fumX:	pop	es
 30830                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30831                                  	;pop	dx
 30832                                  	;pop	cx
 30833                                  	;pop	ax
 30834 00002FCB C3                      	retn

 30836                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30871                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30873                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30874                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30875                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30876                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30877

 30891 00002FE4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 30895                                  ; ------------------------------

 30900

 30912

 30914

 30917                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 30918                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 30919

 31228                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31229                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31230                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31231                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31232                                  
 31233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31234                                  ;
 31235                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31236                                  ;
 31237                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31238                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31239                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31240                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31241                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31242                                  ;
 31243                                  ;	Output : none
 31244                                  ;
 31245                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31246                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31247                                  ;
 31248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31249                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31250                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31251                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31252                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31253                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31254                                  
 31255                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31256                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31257                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 31258                                  InitDevLoad:
 31259                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31260                                  	;push	es ; *
 31261                                  
 31262                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31263                                  	; ds = cs
 31264 000030BC 803E[0B20]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31265                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31266                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31267 000030C1 743B                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31268                                  
 31269                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31270                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31271                                  ; %if 0
 31272                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31273 000030C3 803E[FB1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31274                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31275 000030C8 7415                    	je	short InitForConv
 31276                                  
 31277                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31278                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31279                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31280                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31281                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31282                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31283                                  
 31284 000030CA E87A04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31285                                  
 31286 000030CD E883FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31287 000030D0 E8BFFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31288 000030D3 E85900                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31289 000030D6 9C                      	pushf
 31290 000030D7 E843FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31291 000030DA 9D                      	popf

 31299                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 31354                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?

 31357                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31358                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in

 31392                                  ;
 31393                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31394                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31395                                  ;

 31400                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31401                                  ;	push	ds
 31402                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31403                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31404                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31405                                  ;	pop	ds

 31413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31414                                  ;
 31415                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31416                                  ;
 31417                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31418                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31419                                  ;		 the device.
 31420                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31421                                  ;
 31422                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31423                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31424                                  ;	UMB.
 31425                                  ;
 31426                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31427                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31428                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31429                                  ;
 31430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31431                                  
 31432                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31433                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31434                                  
 31435                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31436                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31437                                  	; ds = cs
 31438 0000312F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31439 00003132 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31440 00003135 CD21                    	int	21h
 31441                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31442                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31443                                  
 31444 00003137 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31445 00003139 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31446                                  
 31447 0000313B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31448                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31449                                  	; ds = cs
 31450 0000313C 391E[ED1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31451                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31452 00003140 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31453 00003142 43                      	inc	bx
 31454                                  
 31455 00003143 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31456 00003146 CD21                    	int	21h
 31457 00003148 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31458                                  
 31459                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31460                                  	;dec	ax
 31461                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31462                                  	;
 31463                                  PrepareMark:
 31464 0000314A 1E                      	push	ds
 31465 0000314B 48                      	dec	ax
 31466 0000314C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31467 0000314E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31468 00003154 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31469 0000315A 40                      	inc	ax
 31470 0000315B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31471                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31472                                  	; ds = cs
 31473                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31474                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31475                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31476 0000315C 891E[FF1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31477 00003160 A3[FD1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax

 31481                                  	; cf=0
 31482                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31483 00003166 C3                      	retn
 31484                                  gufd_err:
 31485 00003167 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31486                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31487                                  	; ds = cs
 31488                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31489                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31490                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31493 0000316F A3[0120]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax

 31495 00003173 C3                      	retn

 31498                                  ;
 31499                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31500                                  ;
 31501                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31502                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31503                                  ;
 31504                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31505                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31506                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31507                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31508                                  ;
 31509                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31510                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31511                                  ;
 31512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31513                                  
 31514                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31515                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31516                                  
 31517                                  DevSetMark:
 31518 00003174 06                      	push	es
 31519                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31520                                  	;push	di
 31521 00003175 1E                      	push	ds
 31522 00003176 56                      	push	si
 31523 00003177 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31524 00003179 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31525 0000317F 40                      	inc	ax
 31526 00003180 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31527                                  
 31528                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31529                                  
 31530 00003184 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31531 00003185 2EC536[7A03]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31532                                  
 31533 0000318A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31534 0000318C FC                      	cld
 31535                                  dsm_again:
 31536 0000318D AC                      	lodsb
 31537 0000318E 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31538 00003190 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31539 00003192 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31540 00003194 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31541                                  isit_slash:
 31542 00003196 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31543 00003198 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31544 0000319A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31545 0000319C EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31546                                  isit_null:
 31547 0000319E 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31548 000031A0 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31549 000031A2 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31550                                  
 31551 000031A4 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31552 000031A7 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31553                                  dsm_next_char:
 31554 000031AA AC                      	lodsb
 31555 000031AB 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31556 000031AD 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31557 000031AF 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31558 000031B1 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31559 000031B3 AA                      	stosb
 31560 000031B4 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31561                                  blankout:
 31562 000031B6 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31563 000031B8 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31564 000031BA F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31565                                  dsm_exit:
 31566 000031BC 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31567 000031BD 5E                      	pop	si
 31568 000031BE 1F                      	pop	ds
 31569                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31570                                  	;pop	di
 31571 000031BF 07                      	pop	es
 31572 000031C0 C3                      	retn

 31575                                  ;
 31576                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31577                                  ;
 31578                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31579                                  ;
 31580                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31581                                  ;
 31582                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31583                                  ;	in DevSize
 31584                                  ;
 31585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31586                                  
 31587                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31588                                  SizeDevice:
 31589                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31590                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31591 000031C1 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31592 000031C2 06                      	push	es
 31593 000031C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31594 000031C4 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31595 000031C6 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31596 000031C9 CD21                    	int	21h
 31597 000031CB 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31598                                  
 31599 000031CD 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31600 000031CF B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31601 000031D2 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31602 000031D4 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31603 000031D6 CD21                    	int	21h
 31604 000031D8 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31605 000031DA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31606 000031DD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31607 000031E0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31608 000031E4 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31609 000031E6 2EC706[ED1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31610                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31611 000031ED EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31612                                  szdev1:
 31613 000031EF B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31614 000031F1 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31615 000031F3 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31616 000031F5 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31617 000031F7 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31618                                  	;
 31619                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31620 000031F9 2E3B06[0C20]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31621 000031FE 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 31622 00003200 2EA1[0C20]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31623                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31624 00003204 F8                      	clc
 31625                                  szdev2:
 31626 00003205 2EA3[ED1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31627                                  
 31628                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31629                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31630                                  	; cf=0
 31631                                  	;clc
 31632                                  sd_close:
 31633 00003209 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31634                                  					;  carry flag
 31635 0000320A B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31636 0000320D CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31637 0000320F 9D                      	popf
 31638                                  sd_err:
 31639                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31640                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31641 00003210 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31642 00003211 C3                      	retn

 31963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31964                                  ;
 31965                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31966                                  ;
 31967                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31968                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31969                                  ;
 31970                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31971                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31972                                  ;
 31973                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31974                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31975                                  ;
 31976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31977                                  
 31978                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31979                                  
 31980                                  	; 036/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31981                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 31982                                  
 31983                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31984                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31985                                  GetHexNum:
 31986 00003308 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31987 0000330A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31988                                  ghn_next:
 31989 0000330C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31990 0000330F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31991 00003312 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31992 00003314 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31993 00003317 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31994 00003319 50                      	push	ax
 31995 0000331A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31996 0000331C E8FA0F                  	call	delim
 31997 0000331F 58                      	pop	ax
 31998                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31999 00003320 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 32000 00003323 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32001 00003325 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32002                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32003                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32004 00003328 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32005                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32006                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32007                                  ghn_shift1:
 32008 0000332A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32009 0000332C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32010 0000332E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32011 00003330 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32012 00003332 46                      	inc	si
 32013 00003333 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32014                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32015 00003335 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32016 00003338 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32017 0000333B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32018 0000333F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32019                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32020                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32021                                  ghn_shift2:
 32022 00003341 F8                      	clc
 32023 00003342 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32024 00003344 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32025 00003346 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32026 00003348 F8                      	clc
 32027 00003349 C3                      	retn
 32028                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32029                                  ghn_err:
 32030                                  gnib_err:
 32031 0000334A F9                      	stc
 32032                                  ghn_ret:
 32033                                  gnib_ret:
 32034 0000334B C3                      	retn

 32037                                  ;
 32038                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32039                                  ;
 32040                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32041                                  ;
 32042                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 32043                                  ;
 32044                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32045                                  ;
 32046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32047                                  
 32048                                  GetNibble:
 32049 0000334C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32050                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32051                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32052 0000334F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32053 00003351 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32054 00003354 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32055 00003356 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32056 00003359 C3                      	retn
 32057                                  is_it_hex:
 32058 0000335A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32059                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32060                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32061 0000335D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32062 0000335F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32063 00003362 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32064 00003364 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32065 00003367 C3                      	retn
 32066                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32067                                  ;gnib_err:
 32068                                  ;	stc
 32069                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32070                                  ;	retn

 32155                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32156                                  ;
 32157                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32158                                  ;
 32159                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32160                                  ;
 32161                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32162                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32163                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32164                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32165                                  ;				NC
 32166                                  ;			  else 
 32167                                  ;				CY
 32168                                  ;
 32169                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32170                                  ;
 32171                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32172                                  
 32173                                  umb_allocate:
 32174                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32175                                  	; ds = cs
 32176 000033A9 50                      	push	ax
 32177 000033AA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32178 000033AC BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32179                                  					;   possible
 32180                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32181 000033AF FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32182                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32183                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32184                                  					; the largest UMB
 32185 000033B3 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32186 000033B5 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32187                                  	
 32188 000033B7 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32189                                  
 32190                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32191 000033B9 FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32192                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32193                                  
 32194 000033BD 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32195 000033C0 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32196                                  	;clc
 32197                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32198                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32199                                  	; cf=0
 32200                                  	;clc 
 32201                                  ua_done:
 32202 000033C2 58                      	pop	ax
 32203 000033C3 C3                      	retn

 32208                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32209                                  ;
 32210                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32211                                  ;
 32212                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32213                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32214                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32215                                  ;			; DS = data
 32216                                  ;

 32218                                  ;

 32220                                  ;
 32221                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32222                                  
 32223                                  umb_insert:
 32224 000033C7 1E                      	push	ds
 32225                                  
 32226                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32227                                  	; ds = cs
 32228                                  
 32229                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]

 32231                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]

 32233 000033D0 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32234 000033D2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32235                                  ui_next:
 32236 000033D4 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32237                                  					;    new block
 32238 000033D6 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32239                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32240                                  					;    last
 32241 000033D8 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32242 000033DE 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32243                                  					; N: get next block
 32244 000033E0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32245                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32246 000033E2 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32247 000033E5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32248                                  
 32249                                  ui_insert:
 32250 000033E7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32251 000033E9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32252                                  
 32253 000033EA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32254 000033EC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32255                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32256 000033EE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32257                                  	;mov	word [1],8

 32265

 32269                                  					; mark as free

 32271                                  					; start & end of new block

 32287 0000342F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax

 32291                                  
 32292                                  ui_append:

 32296                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32297                                  					; block for the next arena.

 32304                                  					;    seg. address of new block

 32308                                  
 32309 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
