 32311 00003463 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32312 00003467 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32313                                  
 32314                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32315 0000346E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32316 00003470 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32317 00003476 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32318                                  					; mark as free
 32319 0000347D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32320 0000347E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32321                                  ui_done:
 32322                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32323 00003483 1F                      	pop	ds
 32324                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32325                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32326 00003484 C3                      	retn
 32327                                  
 32328                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32329                                  
 32330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32331                                  ;
 32332                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32333                                  ;
 32334                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32335                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32336                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32337                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32338                                  ;
 32339                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32340                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32341                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32342                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32343                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32344                                  ;
 32345                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32346                                  
 32347                                  umb_coalesce:
 32348                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32349                                  	; ds = cs
 32350 00003485 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32351                                  
 32352 00003486 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32353                                  
 32354                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32355                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32356 00003488 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32357 0000348C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32358                                  uc_nextfree:
 32359 00003491 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32360 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32361                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32362 00003495 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32363 0000349A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32364                                  					; N: get next arena
 32365 0000349C E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32366 0000349F 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32367 000034A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32368                                  uc_again:
 32369 000034A3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32370 000034A6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32371                                  uc_check:
 32372 000034A8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32373 000034AD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32374                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32375 000034AF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32376 000034B4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32377                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32378 000034B5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32379 000034B9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32380 000034BC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32381 000034BE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32382                                  
 32383                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32384                                  ;uc_done:
 32385                                  	;retn
 32386                                  
 32387                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32388                                  ;
 32389                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32390                                  ;
 32391                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32392                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32393                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32394                                  ;
 32395                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32396                                  
 32397                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32398                                  get_next:
 32399 000034C0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32400 000034C5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32401                                  _get_next_:
 32402 000034C7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32403 000034C9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32404 000034CD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32405 000034CE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32406                                  	;clc
 32407                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32408                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32409                                  	; cf=0
 32410                                  	;clc
 32411 000034D0 C3                      	retn
 32412                                  gn_err:
 32413 000034D1 F9                      	stc
 32414                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32415                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32416 000034D2 C3                      	retn
 32417                                  
 32418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32419                                  ;
 32420                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32421                                  ;
 32422                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32423                                  
 32424                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32425                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32426                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32427                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32428                                  	; ds = cs
 32429 000034D3 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32430 000034D6 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32431                                  
 32432                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32433                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32434                                  
 32435                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32436                                  	; ds = cs
 32437                                  
 32438 000034D8 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32439 000034DA B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32440 000034DC D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32441                                  
 32442 000034DE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32443 000034E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32444                                  
 32445 000034E2 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32446                                  
 32447 000034E4 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32448 000034E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32449                                  	
 32450 000034E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32451 000034EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32452                                  					
 32453 000034F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32454 000034FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32455                                  
 32456                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32457                                  
 32458 00003501 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32459 00003503 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32460 00003509 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32461                                  					; mark as free 
 32462 00003510 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32463 00003511 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32464                                  
 32465                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32466                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32467 00003516 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32468 0000351A BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32469 0000351D 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32470                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32471                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32472                                  
 32473                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32474                                  
 32475 00003520 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32476 00003523 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32477 00003526 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32478                                  ;scan_next
 32479                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32480                                  scannext:
 32481 00003528 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32482 0000352C 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32483                                  	
 32484 0000352E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32485 00003530 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32486 00003535 40                      	inc	ax
 32487 00003536 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32488                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32489                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32490 00003538 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32491                                  got_last:
 32492 0000353A 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32493 00003540 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32494                                  	;clc
 32495                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32496                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32497                                  	; cf=0
 32498                                  	;clc
 32499 00003546 C3                      	retn
 32500                                  
 32501                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32502                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32503                                  ;	;stc
 32504                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32505                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32506                                  ;	; cf=1
 32507                                  ;	;stc
 32508                                  ;	retn

 32511                                  ;
 32512                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32513                                  ;
 32514                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32515                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32516                                  ;
 32517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32518                                  
 32519                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32520                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32521                                  	; ds = cs
 32522 00003547 833E[FD1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32523                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32524 0000354C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 32525 0000354E 06                      	push	es
 32526                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32527                                  	;push	bx
 32528                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32529                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32530                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32531                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32532 0000354F 8B1E[0120]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32533 00003553 2B1E[FD1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32534 00003557 8E06[FD1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32535                                  	
 32536 0000355B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32537 0000355E CD21                    	int	21h
 32538                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32539                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32540                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32541 00003560 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32542 00003562 48                      	dec	ax
 32543 00003563 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32544 00003565 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32545                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32546                                  	;pop	bx
 32547 0000356C 07                      	pop	es
 32548                                  su_exit:
 32549 0000356D C3                      	retn

 32556                                  ;

 32558                                  
 32559                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32560                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32561                                  	; ds = cs
 32562 0000356E 1E                      	push	ds
 32563 0000356F 06                      	push	es
 32564                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32565 00003570 803E[1920]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32566                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32567 00003575 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32568                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32569 00003577 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32570                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32571 0000357B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32572 00003580 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32573                                  ulu_next:
 32574 00003585 E838FF                  	call	get_next
 32575 00003588 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32576 0000358A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32577 0000358C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32578 0000358E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32579 00003590 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32580                                  ulu_found:
 32581                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32582 00003592 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32583                                  ulu_x:
 32584 00003597 07                      	pop	es
 32585 00003598 1F                      	pop	ds
 32586 00003599 C3                      	retn

 32588                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32589                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32590                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32591                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32592                                  
 32593                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32594                                  ;
 32595                                  ; Summary:
 32596                                  ;
 32597                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32598                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32599                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32600                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32601                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32602                                  ;
 32603                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32604                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32605                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32606                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32607                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32608                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32609                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32610                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32611                                  ;
 32612                                  ; Example:
 32613                                  ;
 32614                                  ;   [menu]
 32615                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32616                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32617                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32618                                  ;
 32619                                  ;   [network]
 32620                                  ;   include misc
 32621                                  ;   device=foo
 32622                                  ;
 32623                                  ;   [misc]
 32624                                  ;   device=bar
 32625                                  ;   include alternate
 32626                                  ;
 32627                                  ;   [alternate]
 32628                                  ;   device=tar
 32629                                  ;
 32630                                  ;
 32631                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32632                                  ;
 32633                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32634                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32635                                  ;
 32636                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32637                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32638                                  ;   following order:
 32639                                  ;
 32640                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32641                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32642                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32643                                  ;
 32644                                  
 32645                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32646                                  
 32647                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32648                                  
 32649                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32650                                  
 32651                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32652                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32653                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32654                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32655                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32656                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32657                                  
 32658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32659                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32660                                  
 32661                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32662                                  
 32663                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32664                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32665                                  
 32666 0000359A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32667

 32670                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32671                                  ;
 32672                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32673                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32674                                  ;
 32675                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32676                                  
 32677                                  setparms:
 32678 0000359B 1E                      	push	ds
 32679 0000359C 50                      	push	ax
 32680 0000359D 53                      	push	bx
 32681 0000359E 51                      	push	cx
 32682 0000359F 52                      	push	dx
 32683                                  
 32684 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 32685 000035A1 1F                      	pop	ds
 32686                                  
 32687 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32688 000035A4 8A1E[B34A]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32689                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32690 000035A8 43                      	inc	bx
 32691                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32692                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32693 000035A9 BA[8B49]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32694 000035AC B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32695 000035AE B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32696 000035B0 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32697 000035B2 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32698 000035B4 CD21                    	int	21h
 32699                                  
 32700                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32701                                  ;
 32702                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32703                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 32704                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 32705                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32706                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 32707                                  ;
 32708                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32709                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 32710                                  
 32711                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32712                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32713                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32714 000035B6 F606[B44A]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32715 000035BB 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 32716                                  
 32717                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 32718                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32719 000035BD 8A0E[B34A]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32720 000035C1 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32721 000035C4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 32722                                  
 32723 000035C6 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 32724 000035C8 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32725                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32726 000035CA 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 32727                                  
 32728                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32729                                  ;
 32730                                  ;not_ec35:
 32731                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 32732                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 32733                                  ;
 32734                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 32735                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32736                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)

 32738                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok

 32740                                  
 32741                                  eot_ok:

 32743 000035CF 59                      	pop	cx
 32744 000035D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 32745 000035D1 58                      	pop	ax
 32746 000035D2 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 32747 000035D3 C3                      	retn

 32777                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32778                                  ;
 32779                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32780                                  ;
 32781                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32782                                  ;
 32783                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32784                                  
 32785                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32786                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 32787                                  
 32788                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32789                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32790                                  parseline:
 32791                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32792                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32793                                  
 32794                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32795                                  
 32796                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32797                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32798                                  
 32799                                  nextswtch:
 32800                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32801                                  	je	short done_line
 32802                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32803                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32804                                  
 32805                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32806                                  
 32807                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32808                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32809                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32810                                  	je	short getparm
 32811                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32812                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32813                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32814                                  swterr:
 32815                                  	retn
 32816                                  
 32817                                  getparm:
 32818                                  	call	check_switch
 32819                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32820                                  	jc	short swterr
 32821                                  getnext:
 32822                                  	call	getchr
 32823                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32824                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32825                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32826                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 32827                                  ;swterr:
 32828                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32829                                  
 32830                                  done_line:
 32831                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32832                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32833                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified

 32835                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32836                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32837                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32838                                  	retn
 32839                                  
 32840                                  okay:

 32843                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32844                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32845                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32846                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32847                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32848                                  	; cf=0
 32849                                  	;clc
 32850                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32851                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32852                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 32853                                  ;exitpl:
 32854                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32855                                  	; ds = cs
 32856                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32857                                  	retn
 32858                                  put_back:
 32859                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32860                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32861                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32862                                  
 32863                                  %endif

 32865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32866                                  ;
 32867                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32868                                  ;
 32869                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32870                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32871                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32872                                  ; error.
 32873                                  ;
 32874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32875                                  
 32876                                  check_switch:
 32877 000035F0 E8CAF3                  	call	getchr
 32878                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32879 000035F3 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32880 000035F5 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32881 000035F7 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32882                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32883 000035F9 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32884 000035FB 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32885 000035FD 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32886                                  
 32887 000035FF 06                      	push	es
 32888                                  
 32889 00003600 0E                      	push	cs
 32890 00003601 07                      	pop	es
 32891                                  
 32892 00003602 8A0E[484B]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32893 00003606 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32894 00003608 BF[494B]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32895 0000360B F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32896                                  
 32897 0000360D 07                      	pop	es
 32898 0000360E 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32899                                  
 32900 00003610 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32901 00003613 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32902 00003615 8B1E[B44A]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32903 00003619 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32904 0000361B 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32905                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32906 0000361D A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32907                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32908 0000361F 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32909                                  
 32910 00003621 E899F3                  	call	getchr
 32911 00003624 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32912                                  
 32913 00003626 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32914 00003628 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32915                                  
 32916 0000362A E890F3                  	call	getchr
 32917 0000362D 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32918                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32919                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32920                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32921                                  	; ds = cs
 32922 0000362E C606[AC02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '

 32925                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32926 00003636 C606[AC02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32927 0000363B 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32928                                  
 32929                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32930                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32931                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32932                                  
 32933 0000363C E80500                  	call	process_num
 32934                                  
 32935                                  done_swtch:
 32936                                  	;clc
 32937                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32938                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32939                                  	; cf=0
 32940                                  	;clc
 32941 0000363F C3                      	retn
 32942                                  
 32943                                  err_swtch:

 32945                                  err_check:
 32946 00003642 F9                      	stc
 32947                                  err_chk:
 32948 00003643 C3                      	retn

 32952                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32953                                  ;
 32954                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32955                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32956                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32957                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32958                                  ;
 32959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32960

 32969 0000364D 7404                    	jz	short try_f

 32978 00003653 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h

 32980 00003656 7404                    	jz	short try_t

 32983

 32985 00003658 A2[8C49]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al

 32987                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32988                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32989                                  	; cf=0

 32991                                  try_t:

 32993 0000365E 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 32994                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32995 00003660 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 32996                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 32997 00003663 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 32998                                  
 32999                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 33000 00003665 A3[8F49]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 33001                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33002                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33003                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33004                                  	; cf=0
 33005 00003668 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33006                                  try_s:
 33007                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33008 00003669 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 33009                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 33010 0000366C 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 33011 0000366E A3[B14A]                	mov	[slim],ax
 33012                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33013                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33014                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33015                                  	; cf=0
 33016 00003671 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33017                                  
 33018                                  ; must be for number of heads
 33019

 33025                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33129                                  ;
 33130                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33131                                  ;
 33132                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33133                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33134                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33135                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33136                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33137                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33138                                  ;
 33139                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33140                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33141                                  ;
 33142                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33143                                  ;
 33144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33145                                  
 33146                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33147                                  
 33148                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33149                                  
 33150                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33151                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 33152                                  
 33153                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33154                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33155                                  	; ds = cs
 33156                                  
 33157 000036B8 06                      	push	es
 33158                                  
 33159 000036B9 0E                      	push	cs
 33160 000036BA 07                      	pop	es
 33161                                  
 33162 000036BB 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33163 000036BD 8A1E[8C49]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33164 000036C1 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33165 000036C4 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33166                                  
 33167 000036C6 C706[8F49]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33168                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33169                                  got_80:
 33170 000036CC D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33171 000036CE 8BB7[344B]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33172                                  
 33173                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33174                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33175 000036D2 BF[9249]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33176 000036D5 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 33177 000036D8 FC                      	cld
 33178                                  	;repe	movsb
 33179                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33180 000036D9 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 33181                                  
 33182 000036DB 07                      	pop	es
 33183                                  
 33184                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33185 000036DC F606[B44A]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33186                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33187 000036E1 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 33188                                  
 33189 000036E3 A1[B14A]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 33190                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 33191 000036E6 A3[9F49]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 33192                                  
 33193                                  see_heads:
 33194                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33195 000036E9 F606[B44A]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33196                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33197 000036EE 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 33198                                  
 33199 000036F0 A1[AF4A]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 33200                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 33201 000036F3 A3[A149]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 33202                                  
 33203                                  heads_not_altered:
 33204                                  
 33205                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 33206                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 33207                                  
 33208                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 33209                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33210                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 33211                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33212 000036F6 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 33213 000036F9 A2[9449]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 33214                                  
 33215 000036FC B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 33216                                  
 33217                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 33218                                  
 33219                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 33220                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33221 000036FE 8A3E[9C49]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 33222                                  	
 33223                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33224                                  	; ax = 2
 33225 00003702 3906[A149]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 33226                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 33227 00003706 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 33228                                  
 33229 00003708 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 33230                                  
 33231                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33232                                  
 33233 0000370A 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33234                                  
 33235                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33236                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33237                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33238                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33239                                  
 33240                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33241                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33242                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33243                                  
 33244 0000370C 833E[9F49]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33245 00003711 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33246 00003713 833E[8F49]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33247 00003718 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33248                                  
 33249                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33250                                  
 33251 0000371A EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33252                                  
 33253                                  ;	check for 320K
 33254                                  
 33255                                  not_144m:
 33256 0000371C 833E[8F49]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33257 00003721 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33258 00003723 833E[9F49]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33259 00003728 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33260                                  
 33261 0000372A B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 33262 0000372C EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33263                                  
 33264                                  only_one_head:
 33265                                  
 33266                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33267                                  
 33268 0000372E 803E[8C49]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33269 00003733 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33270                                  
 33271                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33272                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33273                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33274                                  
 33275 00003735 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 33276 00003737 833E[9F49]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33277                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33278 0000373C 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 33279                                  
 33280 0000373E B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33281                                  
 33282                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33283                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33284                                  
 33285                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 33286                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33287                                  	; ax = 2
 33288 00003740 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 33289 00003741 A2[9449]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 33290                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33291                                  
 33292                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33293 00003744 881E[9C49]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33294                                  
 33295                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33296                                  
 33297 00003748 A1[8F49]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33298 0000374B F726[A149]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33299 0000374F F726[9F49]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33300 00003753 A3[9A49]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33301 00003756 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33302                                  
 33303 00003757 C3                      	retn
 33304

 33308                                  ;

 33761                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33762                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33763                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33764 0000394C 26                      	es	
 33765 0000394D AC                      	lodsb
 33766                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33767                                  	;inc	si
 33768                                  	;
 33769 0000394E 49                      	dec	cx
 33770 0000394F C3                      	retn
 33771                                  noget:
 33772 00003950 59                      	pop	cx
 33773                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33774                                  	; ds = cs
 33775                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33776                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33777 00003951 893E[5403]              	mov	[count],di
 33778 00003955 893E[5603]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33779 00003959 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33780                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33781 0000395B 8936[5803]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33782                                  
 33783                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33784                                  
 33785                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33786                                  
 33787                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33788                                  ;	retn
 33789                                  ;else
 33790                                  
 33791                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33792                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33793                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33794                                  
 33795 0000395F 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 33796 00003961 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 33797                                  
 33798                                  ;endif
 33799                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33800                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33801                                  	;retn
 33802                                  
 33803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33804                                  ;
 33805                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33806                                  ;
 33807                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33808                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33809                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33810                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33811                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33812                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33813                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33814                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33815                                  ;
 33816                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33817                                  
 33818                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33819                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 33820                                  
 33821                                  skip_comment:
 33822 00003964 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33823                                  
 33824                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33825                                  	; ds = cs	
 33826                                  
 33827 00003966 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33828                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33829 0000396B 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33830                                  
 33831 0000396D 803E[4F03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33832                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33833 00003972 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33834                                  
 33835 00003974 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33836                                  	
 33837 00003977 3806[5003]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33838                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33839 0000397B 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33840                                  
 33841 0000397D 803E[4F03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33842                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33843 00003982 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33844                                  
 33845 00003984 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33846                                  	
 33847 00003988 3806[5103]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33848                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33849 0000398C 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33850                                  skip_cmmt:
 33851 0000398E E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33852 00003990 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33853 00003993 46                      	inc	si
 33854 00003994 49                      	dec	cx
 33855 00003995 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33856 00003997 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33857                                  no_commt:
 33858 00003999 C3                      	retn

 33860                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33861                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 33862                                  
 33863                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33864                                  ;%if 0
 33865                                  
 33866                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33867                                  
 33868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33869                                  ;
 33870                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33871                                  ;
 33872                                  ;   INPUT
 33873                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33874                                  ;
 33875                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33876                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33877                                  ;
 33878                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33879                                  ;       All
 33880                                  ;
 33881                                  ;   HISTORY
 33882                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33883                                  ;
 33884                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33885                                  
 33886                                  kbd_read:
 33887 0000399A F606[5748]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33888 0000399F 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33889                                  
 33890 000039A1 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33891 000039A2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33892 000039A4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33893                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33894                                  kbd_loop:
 33895 000039A6 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 33896 000039A8 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33897 000039AA 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33898 000039AC B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33899 000039AE CD16                            int     16h             ;
 33900 000039B0 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33901 000039B2 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33902 000039B4 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33903                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33904                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33905 000039B7 2E2B06[8403]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33906                                  
 33907 000039BC 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 33908 000039BE 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33909                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33910 000039C0 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33911                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33912 000039C1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33913 000039C3 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33914 000039C5 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 33915 000039C7 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33916 000039C9 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33917 000039CB 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 33918 000039CC 43                              inc     bx
 33919                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33920 000039CD 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33921                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33922 000039D2 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33923 000039D4 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 33924 000039D6 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33925 000039D8 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33926 000039DA 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33927                                  
 33928                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33929 000039DC 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33930 000039DF 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33931                                  	
 33932 000039E1 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33933 000039E4 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33934                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33935 000039E6 BA[EF4C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33936 000039E9 E83D0C                          call    print
 33937                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33938 000039EC 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 33939 000039F1 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33940                                  kbd_notf5:
 33941                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33942 000039F3 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33943 000039F6 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33944                                  
 33945 000039F8 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33946 000039FB 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33947                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33948 000039FD BA[2D4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33949 00003A00 E8260C                          call    print           ;
 33950 00003A03 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33951 00003A05 881E[5B48]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33952                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33953 00003A09 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 33954 00003A0B CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33955 00003A0D C606[6148]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33956 00003A12 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 33957 00003A14 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33958                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33959 00003A16 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33960 00003A19 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33961                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33962 00003A1B E88808                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33963 00003A1E F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33964 00003A1F C3                              retn			;
 33965                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33966 00003A20 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33967 00003A21 C3                              retn			;
 33968                                  
 33969                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33970                                  ;
 33971                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33972                                  ;
 33973                                  ;   INPUT
 33974                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33977                                  ;       None
 33978                                  ;
 33979                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33980                                  ;       None
 33981                                  ;
 33982                                  ;   HISTORY
 33983                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33984                                  ;
 33985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33986                                  
 33987                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33988                                  
 33989                                  set_numlock:
 33990                                          ; 04/01/2023
 33991                                  	;push	ax
 33992 00003A22 1E                              push    ds
 33993 00003A23 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 33994 00003A25 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 33995 00003A27 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33996 00003A2A 2E3B06[CA4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33997 00003A2F 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 33998 00003A31 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33999 00003A36 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 34000                                  not_off:
 34001 00003A38 2E3B06[C84C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34002 00003A3D F9                              stc
 34003 00003A3E 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 34004 00003A40 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 34005                                  set_done:
 34006 00003A45 1F                              pop     ds
 34007                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34008                                  	;pop	ax
 34009 00003A46 C3                              retn
 34010                                  
 34011                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34012                                  
 34013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34014                                  ;
 34015                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34016                                  ;
 34017                                  ;   INPUT
 34018                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34019                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34020                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34021                                  ;
 34022                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34023                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34024                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34025                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34026                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34027                                  ;
 34028                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34029                                  ;       All
 34030                                  ;
 34031                                  ;   NOTES
 34032                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34033                                  ;
 34034                                  ;   HISTORY
 34035                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34036                                  ;
 34037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34038                                  
 34039                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34040                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 34041                                  
 34042                                  menu_check:
 34043                                  
 34044                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 34045                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34046                                  
 34047 00003A47 51                              push    cx              ;
 34048 00003A48 56                              push    si              ;
 34049 00003A49 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34050                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34051 00003A4B E84E07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34052 00003A4E 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34053 00003A50 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 34054 00003A52 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34055 00003A54 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34056 00003A55 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34057                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34058 00003A57 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34059 00003A59 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34060 00003A5B 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34061 00003A5D 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34062 00003A5F E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34063 00003A62 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34064 00003A67 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34065                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34066 00003A69 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34067 00003A6B 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34068                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34069 00003A6D E82C07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34070                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34071 00003A70 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34072 00003A72 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34073 00003A74 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34074 00003A76 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34075 00003A78 E82107                          call    get_char        ;
 34076 00003A7B 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34077 00003A7D 3A06[491F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34078 00003A81 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34079 00003A83 800E[5748]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34080 00003A88 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34081                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34082 00003A8A 3A06[551F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34083 00003A8E 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34084 00003A90 800E[5748]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34085 00003A95 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34086                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34087 00003A97 E8D306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34088 00003A9A EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34089                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34090 00003A9C 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34091 00003A9D 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34092                                  
 34093                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34094                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34095                                  
 34096 00003A9E F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34097 00003AA3 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 34098                                  ;
 34099                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34100                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34101                                  ;
 34102 00003AA5 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 34103 00003AA8 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 34104 00003AAA E9F901                          jmp	menu_abort
 34105                                  
 34106                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34107                                  
 34108                                  menu_search:
 34109 00003AAD 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34110 00003AAF BF[9C48]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 34111 00003AB2 E81B04                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34112 00003AB5 7340                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 34113 00003AB7 C606[9448]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34114 00003ABC E91702                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34115                                  
 34116                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34117                                  
 34118                                  menu_color:
 34119 00003ABF 51                              push    cx              ;
 34120 00003AC0 52                              push    dx              ;
 34121 00003AC1 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34122 00003AC4 E8B406                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34123 00003AC7 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34124 00003ACA 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34125 00003ACC 80E2F0                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34126 00003ACF 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34127 00003AD1 E84508                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34128 00003AD4 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34129 00003AD6 E8A206                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34130 00003AD9 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34131 00003ADC 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
