 34132 00003ADE 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34133 00003AE1 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 34134 00003AE3 D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 34135 00003AE5 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34136                                  check_color:                    ;
 34137 00003AE7 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34138 00003AE9 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 34139 00003AEB 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34140                                  set_color:
 34141 00003AEE 8816[5248]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34142 00003AF2 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 34143 00003AF3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34144 00003AF4 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34145                                  
 34146                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34147                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34148                                  
 34149                                  menu_found:
 34150 00003AF7 C606[5C48]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34151 00003AFC C706[5E48]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34152 00003B02 C606[6048]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34153 00003B07 8026[5B48]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34154                                  
 34155 00003B0C E85E06                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34156 00003B0F 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34157                                  
 34158                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34159                                  
 34160                                  menu_process:
 34161 00003B11 E88806                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34162 00003B14 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34163 00003B16 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34164 00003B18 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34165 00003B1A 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34166 00003B1C 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34167 00003B1E 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34168 00003B20 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34169 00003B22 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34170 00003B24 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34171 00003B26 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34172 00003B28 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34173 00003B2A 7493                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34174 00003B2C 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34175 00003B2E 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 34176 00003B30 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34177 00003B32 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34178 00003B34 E8D207                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34179 00003B37 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34180 00003B39 F9                              stc                     ;
 34181 00003B3A E83507                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34182 00003B3D EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34183                                  menu_numlock:
 34184 00003B3F E8E0FE                          call    set_numlock
 34185 00003B42 EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34186                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34187 00003B44 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34188                                  
 34189                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34190                                  
 34191                                  menu_default:
 34192 00003B46 8936[5E48]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34193 00003B4A 803E[6148]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34194 00003B4F 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34195 00003B51 E8F405                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34196 00003B54 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34197 00003B56 E80506                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34198 00003B59 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34199 00003B5B 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 34200 00003B5D E81B06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34201 00003B60 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34202 00003B63 7202                            jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34203 00003B65 B35A                            mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34204                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34205 00003B67 881E[6048]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34206                                  timeout_skip:
 34207 00003B6B EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34208                                  
 34209                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34210                                  
 34211                                  menu_item:
 34212                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 34213 00003B6D 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34214 00003B70 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34215 00003B72 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34216 00003B74 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 34217 00003B77 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34218 00003B79 F9                              stc                     ;
 34219 00003B7A E8F506                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34220 00003B7D EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34221                                  
 34222                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34223                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34224                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34225                                  
 34226                                  menu_itemfound:
 34227 00003B7F 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34228 00003B80 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34229 00003B82 8887[6248]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34230 00003B86 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34231                                  
 34232                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34233                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34234                                  ;   description...
 34235                                  
 34236 00003B88 89B7[6C48]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34237 00003B8C 89B7[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34238 00003B90 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34239 00003B92 E8B305                          call    skip_token      ;
 34240 00003B95 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34241 00003B97 E8C405                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34242 00003B9A 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34243 00003B9C 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 34244 00003B9E 89BF[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34245                                  
 34246                                  menu_nextitem:
 34247 00003BA2 E8C805                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34248 00003BA5 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34249                                  
 34250                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34251                                  
 34252                                  menu_getdefault:
 34253 00003BA8 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34254 00003BAA 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34255 00003BAC 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34256 00003BAE E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34257                                  menu_valid:
 34258 00003BB1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 34259 00003BB3 8816[5D48]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34260 00003BB7 8B3E[5E48]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34261 00003BBB 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34262 00003BBD 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34263 00003BBF 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34264                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34265 00003BC0 53                              push    bx              ;
 34266 00003BC1 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 34267 00003BC3 8BB7[6C48]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34268 00003BC7 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34269 00003BCA 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34270 00003BCB 06                              push    es              ;
 34271 00003BCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34272 00003BCD E82703                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34273 00003BD0 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34274 00003BD1 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 34275 00003BD2 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34276 00003BD4 43                              inc     bx              ;
 34277 00003BD5 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34278 00003BD9 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34279                                  menu_nodefault:
 34280 00003BDB B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34281                                  menu_setdefault:
 34282 00003BDD 881E[5C48]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34283                                  
 34284                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34285                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34286                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34287                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34288                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34289                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34290                                  
 34291 00003BE1 803E[6048]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34292 00003BE6 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 34293 00003BE8 F606[5B48]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34294 00003BED 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34295 00003BEF E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34296                                  
 34297                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34298                                  
 34299                                  menu_display:
 34300 00003BF2 B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34301 00003BF4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34302 00003BF6 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34303 00003BF8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34304 00003BFA 06                              push    es              ;
 34305 00003BFB B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34306 00003BFE 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34307 00003C00 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34308 00003C04 A3[5948]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34309 00003C07 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34310 00003C0B A2[5848]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34311 00003C0E A1[5348]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34312 00003C11 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34313 00003C13 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34314 00003C16 8A3E[5248]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34315 00003C1A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34316                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34317 00003C1C 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34318 00003C21 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 34319                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34320 00003C23 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34321 00003C28 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34322 00003C2A 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34323 00003C2C 8A36[5648]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34324                                  menu_clear:
 34325 00003C30 CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34326 00003C32 07                              pop     es              ;
 34327 00003C33 8836[5648]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34328 00003C37 BA[6A4D]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34329 00003C3A E8EC09                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34330                                  
 34331 00003C3D F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34332 00003C42 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34333 00003C44 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34334 00003C48 8A36[5648]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34335 00003C4C B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34336 00003C4E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34337 00003C50 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34338 00003C52 BA[B64D]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34339 00003C55 E8D109                          call    print           ;
 34340 00003C58 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34341 00003C5A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34342 00003C5C 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34343 00003C5F 8816[5548]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34344                                  
 34345                                  menu_nostatus:
 34346 00003C63 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34347                                  menu_disploop:
 34348 00003C66 E8BD02                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34349 00003C69 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34350 00003C6A 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34351 00003C6E 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34352                                  
 34353                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34354                                  
 34355 00003C70 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34356 00003C72 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 34357 00003C74 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34358 00003C77 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34359 00003C7B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34360 00003C7D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 34361                                  
 34362 00003C7F BA[A34D]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34363 00003C82 E8A409                          call    print           ;
 34364 00003C85 E83603                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34365 00003C88 BA[764B]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 34366 00003C8B E89B09                          call    print           ;
 34367 00003C8E FF36[5748]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 34368 00003C92 800E[5748]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34369 00003C97 E86F04                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34370 00003C9A 8F06[5748]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34371                                  
 34372                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34373                                  
 34374                                  menu_autoselect:
 34375 00003C9E 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34376 00003CA1 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34377 00003CA3 E80006                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34378                                  menu_abort:
 34379 00003CA6 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34380 00003CA8 E9EE00                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34381                                  
 34382                                  normal_boot:
 34383 00003CAB 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34384 00003CAE 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34385 00003CB0 8B0E[5403]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34386 00003CB4 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34387 00003CB6 E9F4FD                          jmp     menu_search
 34388                                  
 34389                                  not_topmenu:
 34390 00003CB9 80BF[6248]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34391 00003CBE 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 34392 00003CC0 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 34393 00003CC2 8BBF[6C48]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34394 00003CC6 E8EE01                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34395 00003CC9 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 34396 00003CCB 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34397 00003CCD E927FE                          jmp     menu_found
 34398                                  
 34399                                  not_submenu:
 34400 00003CD0 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34401 00003CD2 8B9F[6C48]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34402                                  
 34403                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34404                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34405                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34406                                  
 34407                                  no_selection:
 34408 00003CD6 891E[5E48]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34409 00003CDA 8B0E[5403]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34410 00003CDE 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34411 00003CE0 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34412 00003CE1 8E1E[DD14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34413 00003CE5 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 34414                                  
 34415                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34416                                  ;
 34417                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34418                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34419                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34420                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 34421                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34422                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34425                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34426                                  
 34427                                  copyblock_loop:
 34428 00003CE7 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34429 00003CE8 E83C01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34430 00003CEB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 34431 00003CEC 723C                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34432                                  
 34433                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 34434                                  
 34435                                  copyblock_begin:
 34436 00003CEE 50                              push    ax              ;
 34437 00003CEF 51                              push    cx              ;
 34438 00003CF0 56                              push    si              ;
 34439 00003CF1 57                              push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34440 00003CF2 BF[A148]                        mov     di,szCommon
 34441 00003CF5 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34442 00003CF6 0E                              push    cs              ;
 34443 00003CF7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34444 00003CF8 E8FC01                          call    comp_names      ;
 34445 00003CFB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34446 00003CFC 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34447 00003CFD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34448 00003CFE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34449 00003CFF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 34450 00003D00 740F                            je	short copyblock_check
 34451 00003D02 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34452 00003D04 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34453 00003D06 57                              push    di              ;
 34454 00003D07 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34455 00003D09 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34456 00003D0A 06                              push    es              ;
 34457 00003D0B 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34458 00003D0C E8E801                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34459 00003D0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34460 00003D10 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34461                                  copyblock_check:
 34462 00003D11 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34463 00003D13 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34464 00003D15 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34465 00003D18 EBCD                            jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34466                                  
 34467                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34468 00003D1A E85004                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34469 00003D1D E87C04                          call    get_char        ;
 34470 00003D20 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34471 00003D22 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34472 00003D24 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34473 00003D26 74C6                            je	short copyblock_begin
 34474 00003D28 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34475                                  ;
 34476                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34477                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34478                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34479                                  ;
 34480                                  move_config:
 34481 00003D2A 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34482 00003D2C 51                              push    cx              ;
 34483                                  ;
 34484                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34485                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34486                                  ;
 34487                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34488 00003D2D B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34489 00003D30 BE[9448]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34490 00003D33 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34491                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34492                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34493                                  copy_boot: 
 34494                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34495 00003D34 2E                              cs
 34496 00003D35 AC                      	lodsb
 34497 00003D36 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 34498 00003D38 47                              inc     di              ;
 34499 00003D39 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 34500                                  
 34501 00003D3B 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34502                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34503                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34504 00003D3C B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 34505 00003D3E 2E8B36[5E48]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34506 00003D43 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 34507 00003D45 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 34508 00003D47 0E                              push    cs              ;
 34509 00003D48 07                              pop     es              ;
 34510 00003D49 BE[A148]                        mov     si,szCommon
 34511 00003D4C 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34512 00003D4F E8B705                          call    any_delim       ;
 34513 00003D52 7406                            je	short l2	;
 34514 00003D54 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 34515 00003D56 46                              inc     si              ;
 34516 00003D57 47                              inc     di              ;
 34517 00003D58 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 34518 00003D5A C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34519 00003D5D 07                              pop     es              ;
 34520                                  
 34521                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34522                                  
 34523 00003D5E 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 34524 00003D60 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34525 00003D65 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34526 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34527                                  
 34528 00003D68 51                              push    cx              ;
 34529 00003D69 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34530 00003D6B 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34531 00003D6C 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 34532 00003D6E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34533                                  
 34534                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34535                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34536                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34537                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34538                                  ;   is empty.
 34539                                  
 34540 00003D6F 06                              push    es              ;
 34541 00003D70 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 34542 00003D72 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34543 00003D73 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34544 00003D79 E82800                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34545 00003D7C 07                              pop     es
 34546                                  
 34547                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34548                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34549                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34550                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34551                                  
 34552                                  menu_done:
 34553 00003D7D 803E[5348]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34554 00003D82 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 34555 00003D84 06                              push    es              ;
 34556 00003D85 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34557 00003D88 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 34558 00003D8A A1[5948]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34559 00003D8D 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34560 00003D91 A0[5848]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34561 00003D94 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34562 00003D98 07                              pop     es              ;
 34563                                  menu_exit:
 34564 00003D99 890E[5403]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34565 00003D9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34566 00003DA1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34567 00003DA3 C3                              retn
 34568                                  
 34569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34570                                  ;
 34571                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34572                                  ;
 34573                                  ;   INPUT
 34574                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34575                                  ;
 34576                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34577                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34578                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34579                                  ;
 34580                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34581                                  ;       None
 34582                                  ;
 34583                                  ;   NOTES
 34584                                  ;       None
 34585                                  ;
 34586                                  ;   HISTORY
 34587                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34588                                  ;
 34589                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34590                                  
 34591                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34592                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 34593                                  
 34594                                  copy_envvar:
 34595 00003DA4 51                              push    cx              ;
 34596 00003DA5 56                              push    si              ;
 34597 00003DA6 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34598 00003DA7 06                              push    es              ;
 34599 00003DA8 06                              push    es              ;
 34600 00003DA9 8E06[DD14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34601 00003DAD 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34602                                  
 34603                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34604                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34605                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34608                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34609                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34610                                  
 34611 00003DAE 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 34612                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34613 00003DB0 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 34614 00003DB1 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34615 00003DB3 F9                              stc                     ;
 34616 00003DB4 746C                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34617 00003DB6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr          ;
 34618 00003DB8 F9                              stc                     ;
 34619 00003DB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 34620 00003DBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf          ;
 34621 00003DBD F9                              stc                     ;
 34622 00003DBE 7462                            je	short copy_envexit
 34623 00003DC0 41                              inc     cx              ;
 34624 00003DC1 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 34625 00003DC3 75EB                            jne	short copy_varlen
 34626 00003DC5 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 34627 00003DC7 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34628 00003DC9 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34629 00003DCB 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34630 00003DCC 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34631                                  copy_varsrch:
 34632 00003DCE 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34633 00003DD1 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34634 00003DD3 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34635 00003DD5 51                              push    cx              ;
 34636 00003DD6 56                              push    si              ;
 34637 00003DD7 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 34638 00003DD9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34639 00003DDA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34640 00003DDB 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34641 00003DDD 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34642 00003DE1 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34643                                  
 34644                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34645                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34646                                  
 34647 00003DE3 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34648 00003DE6 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34649 00003DE8 56                              push    si              ;
 34650 00003DE9 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 34651 00003DEB 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 34652 00003DED 2E8B0E[DB14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34653 00003DF2 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34654                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34655                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34656                                  
 34657 00003DF4 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 34658 00003DF5 26                      	es	; 26h
 34659 00003DF6 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 34660                                  
 34661 00003DF7 5E                      	pop     si
 34662                                  copy_envprep:
 34663 00003DF8 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34664 00003DFB 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34665 00003DFD 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34666 00003E00 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 34667                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 34668                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34669                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 34670 00003E02 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 34671 00003E03 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 34672 00003E05 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 34673 00003E07 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 34674 00003E09 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 34675 00003E0B AA                      	stosb                   ;
 34676 00003E0C EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 34677                                  
 34678                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34679 00003E0E 51                              push    cx              ;
 34680 00003E0F B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34681 00003E12 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 34682 00003E14 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34683 00003E15 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34684                                  
 34685                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34686                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 34687                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 34688                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 34689                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 34690                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 34691                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 34692                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 34693                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 34694                                  
 34695                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34696 00003E17 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34697 00003E19 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34698                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34699 00003E1A 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34700 00003E1D 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34701                                  
 34702                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34703 00003E22 07                              pop     es              ;
 34704 00003E23 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34705 00003E24 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34706 00003E25 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34707                                  
 34708                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34709 00003E26 C3                              retn
 34710                                  
 34711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34712                                  ;
 34713                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34714                                  ;
 34715                                  ;   INPUT
 34716                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34717                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34718                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34719                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34720                                  ;
 34721                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34722                                  ;       Same as above
 34723                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34724                                  ;
 34725                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34726                                  ;       All
 34727                                  ;
 34728                                  ;   NOTES
 34729                                  ;       None
 34730                                  ;
 34731                                  ;   HISTORY
 34732                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34733                                  ;
 34734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34735                                  
 34736                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34737                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 34738                                  
 34739                                  copy_block:
 34740 00003E27 E87203                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34741 00003E2A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 34742 00003E2C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34743 00003E2E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34744 00003E30 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 34745                                  
 34746 00003E32 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34747 00003E34 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34748 00003E36 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34749                                  
 34750                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34751                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34752                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34753                                  
 34754 00003E38 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34755 00003E3D 57                              push    di              ;
 34756                                  
 34757 00003E3E BF[9C48]                        mov     di,szMenu
 34758 00003E41 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34759 00003E44 7425                            je	short copy_skip	;
 34760                                  
 34761 00003E46 BF[A148]                        mov     di,szCommon
 34762 00003E49 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34763 00003E4C 741D                            je	short copy_skip	;
 34764                                  
 34765 00003E4E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34766 00003E50 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 34767 00003E53 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 34768 00003E55 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34769 00003E56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34770 00003E58 51                              push    cx              ;
 34771 00003E59 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 34772 00003E5B 56                              push    si              ;
 34773 00003E5C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 34774 00003E5D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 34775 00003E5F E80F03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34776 00003E62 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34777 00003E65 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34778 00003E66 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34779 00003E67 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34780 00003E69 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 34781                                  
 34782                                  copy_skip:
 34783 00003E6B 5F                              pop     di
 34784                                  copy_error:
 34785 00003E6C F8                              clc                     ;
 34786 00003E6D E80204                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34787 00003E70 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 34788                                  
 34789                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34790                                  
 34791                                  copy_line:
 34792 00003E72 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 34793 00003E74 47                              inc     di              ;
 34794 00003E75 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34795 00003E77 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34796 00003E79 2E803E[E014]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34797 00003E7F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34798 00003E81 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34799 00003E84 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34800 00003E86 47                              inc     di              ;
 34801 00003E87 47                              inc     di              ;
 34802 00003E88 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 34803                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34804 00003E8A E80F03                          call    get_char        ;
 34805 00003E8D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34806 00003E8F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 34807 00003E91 47                              inc     di              ;
 34808                                  copy_next:
 34809 00003E92 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34810 00003E94 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34811                                  
 34812                                  copy_nextline:
 34813 00003E96 E8D402                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34814 00003E99 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 34815                                  
 34816                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34817                                  ;copy_done:
 34818                                          ;retn
 34819                                  
 34820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34821                                  ;
 34822                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34823                                  ;
 34824                                  ;   INPUT
 34825                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34826                                  ;
 34827                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34828                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34829                                  ;
 34830                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34831                                  ;       DX
 34832                                  ;
 34833                                  ;   NOTES
 34834                                  ;       None
 34835                                  ;
 34836                                  ;   HISTORY
 34837                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34838                                  ;
 34839                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34840                                  
 34841                                  get_linenum:
 34842 00003E9B 50                              push    ax              ;
 34843 00003E9C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34844 00003E9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 34845 00003E9F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34846 00003EA1 56                              push    si              ;
 34847 00003EA2 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34848 00003EA7 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34849                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34850 00003EA9 E8C502                          call    skip_line       ;
 34851 00003EAC 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 34852 00003EAE 43                              inc     bx              ;
 34853 00003EAF 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34854 00003EB1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34855                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34856 00003EB3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34857 00003EB4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34858 00003EB5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 34859 00003EB6 C3                              retn
 34860                                  
 34861                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34862                                  ;
 34863                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34864                                  ;
 34865                                  ;   INPUT
 34866                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34867                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34868                                  ;
 34869                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34870                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34871                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34872                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34873                                  ;
 34874                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34875                                  ;       None
 34876                                  ;
 34877                                  ;   NOTES
 34878                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34879                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34880                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34881                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34882                                  ;
 34883                                  ;   HISTORY
 34884                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34885                                  ;
 34886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34887                                  
 34888                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34889 00003EB7 50                              push    ax              ;
 34890 00003EB8 51                              push    cx              ;
 34891 00003EB9 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34892 00003EBE 56                              push    si              ;
 34893 00003EBF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 34894 00003EC1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 34895 00003EC2 06                              push    es              ;
 34896 00003EC3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34897 00003EC4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 34898 00003EC7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 34899 00003EC9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 34900 00003ECB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 34901 00003ECC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34902 00003ECD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34903 00003ECE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 34904                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34905 00003ECF C3                              retn			;
 34906                                  
 34907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34908                                  ;
 34909                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34910                                  ;
 34911                                  ;   INPUT
 34912                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34913                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34914                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34915                                  ;
 34916                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34917                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34918                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34919                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34920                                  ;
 34921                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34922                                  ;       AX
 34923                                  ;
 34924                                  ;   NOTES
 34925                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34926                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34927                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34928                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34929                                  ;
 34930                                  ;   HISTORY
 34931                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34932                                  ;
 34933                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34934                                  
 34935                                  find_block:
 34936 00003ED0 E8C902                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34937 00003ED3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34938 00003ED5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34939 00003ED7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34940 00003ED9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 34941 00003EDB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34942 00003EDD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 34943 00003EDF 2E800E[E014]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34944 00003EE5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 34945                                  check_line:
 34946 00003EE7 2E800E[E014]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34947 00003EED E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34948 00003EF0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34949                                  next_line:
 34950 00003EF2 E87802                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34951 00003EF5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 34952                                  ;find_exit:
 34953                                  ;	retn
 34954                                  
 34955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34956                                  ;
 34957                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34958                                  ;
 34959                                  ;   INPUT
 34960                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34961                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34962                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34963                                  ;
 34964                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34965                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34966                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34967                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34968                                  ;
 34969                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34970                                  ;       AX
 34971                                  ;
 34972                                  ;   NOTES
 34973                                  ;       None
 34974                                  ;
 34975                                  ;   HISTORY
 34976                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34977                                  ;
 34978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34979                                  
 34980                                  comp_names:
 34981 00003EF7 57                              push    di              ;
 34982                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34983 00003EF8 E8A102                          call    get_char        ;
 34984 00003EFB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 34985 00003EFD E80904                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34986 00003F00 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34987 00003F02 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34988 00003F04 47                              inc     di              ;
 34989 00003F05 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34990                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34991 00003F08 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34992 00003F0A 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34993 00003F0C F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34994                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34995 00003F0D 5F                              pop     di              ;
 34996 00003F0E C3                              retn			;
 34997                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34998 00003F0F 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34999 00003F11 E8F503                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35000 00003F14 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35001 00003F16 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35002                                  
 35003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35004                                  
 35005                                  comp_names_safe:
 35006 00003F18 50                              push    ax
 35007 00003F19 51                              push    cx
 35008 00003F1A 56                              push	si
 35009 00003F1B 1E                              push    ds
 35010 00003F1C 0E                              push    cs
 35011 00003F1D 1F                              pop     ds
 35012 00003F1E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 35013 00003F21 1F                              pop     ds
 35014 00003F22 5E                      	pop	si
 35015 00003F23 59                              pop     cx
 35016 00003F24 58                              pop     ax
 35017 00003F25 C3                              retn
 35018                                  
 35019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35020                                  ;
 35021                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35022                                  ;
 35023                                  ;   INPUT
 35024                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35025                                  ;
 35026                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35027                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35028                                  ;
 35029                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35030                                  ;       None
 35031                                  ;
 35032                                  ;   NOTES
 35033                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35034                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35035                                  ;
 35036                                  ;   HISTORY
 35037                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35038                                  ;
 35039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35040                                  
 35041                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35042                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 35043                                  
 35044                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35045 00003F26 50                              push    ax              ;
 35046 00003F27 53                              push    bx              ;
 35047 00003F28 51                              push    cx              ;
 35048 00003F29 52                              push    dx              ;
 35049 00003F2A 56                              push    si              ;
 35050 00003F2B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35051 00003F2D 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35052 00003F31 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35053 00003F33 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35054 00003F34 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35055 00003F36 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35056 00003F38 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 35057 00003F3B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 35058 00003F3D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35059 00003F3F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35060 00003F41 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35061 00003F43 8A26[5248]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35062 00003F47 3A1E[5C48]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35063 00003F4B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35064 00003F4D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35065 00003F50 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 35066 00003F52 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 35067 00003F54 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 35068 00003F56 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35069 00003F58 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 35070 00003F5A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35071                                  print_other:                    ;
 35072 00003F5D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 35073 00003F5F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35074 00003F61 8BBF[8048]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35075 00003F65 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35076 00003F67 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35077 00003F6B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35078 00003F6D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35079 00003F70 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35080 00003F72 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35081 00003F74 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35082 00003F76 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35083                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35084 00003F78 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35085 00003F7B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35086 00003F7D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35087 00003F7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35088 00003F81 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35089                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35090 00003F83 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 35091 00003F86 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35092 00003F88 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35093 00003F8A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35094 00003F8C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35095 00003F8E 06                              push    es              ;
 35096                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35097 00003F8F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35098 00003F92 47                              inc     di              ;
 35099 00003F93 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35100 00003F95 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 35101 00003F97 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 35102                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35103 00003F99 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 35104 00003F9B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35105 00003F9D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35106 00003F9F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35107 00003FA1 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35108 00003FA3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35109 00003FA5 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 35110 00003FA7 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35111 00003FAA 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 35112 00003FAC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35113 00003FAE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35114 00003FB0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 35115                                  print_done:                     ;
 35116 00003FB2 07                              pop     es              ;
 35117 00003FB3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35118 00003FB4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35119 00003FB6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35120 00003FB8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35121 00003FB9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35122 00003FBA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35123 00003FBB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35124 00003FBC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35125 00003FBD C3                              retn			;
 35126                                  
 35127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35128                                  ;
 35129                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35130                                  ;
 35131                                  ;   INPUT
 35132                                  ;       None
 35133                                  ;
 35134                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35135                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35136                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35137                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35138                                  ;
 35139                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35140                                  ;       None
 35141                                  ;
 35142                                  ;   NOTES
 35143                                  ;       None
 35144                                  ;
 35145                                  ;   HISTORY
 35146                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35147                                  ;
 35148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35149                                  
 35150                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35151 00003FBE 8A1E[5C48]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35152 00003FC2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35153 00003FC4 E83201                          call    disp_num        ;
 35154 00003FC7 E83F01                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35155 00003FCA 803E[6048]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35156 00003FCF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35157 00003FD1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35158 00003FD3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 35159 00003FD5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35160                                  check_time:
 35161 00003FD7 A0[6048]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35162 00003FDA 2A06[6148]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35163 00003FDE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 35164 00003FE0 800E[5B48]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35165 00003FE5 C606[6148]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35166 00003FEA E9F100                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35167                                  show_time:
 35168 00003FED 53                              push    bx              ;
 35169 00003FEE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35170 00003FF0 8A3E[5348]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35171 00003FF4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
