 35172 00003FF6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35173 00003FF8 52                              push    dx              ;
 35174 00003FF9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35175 00003FFC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35176 00003FFE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35177 00004000 BA[164E]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35178 00004003 E82306                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35179 00004006 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35180 00004008 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35181 00004009 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 35182 0000400B F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35183 0000400D 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 35184 0000400F 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 35185 00004011 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35186 00004013 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35187 00004015 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 35188 00004017 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 35189 00004019 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35190 0000401B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35191 0000401D 5A                              pop     dx
 35192 0000401E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35193 00004020 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35194 00004022 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35195                                  input_key:
 35196 00004023 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35197 00004025 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35198 00004027 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 35199 00004029 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 35200 0000402B 803E[6048]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35201 00004030 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35202 00004032 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35203 00004034 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35204 00004036 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 35205 00004038 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35206 0000403A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 35207 0000403C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 35208 0000403E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35209                                  got_time:
 35210 00004040 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35211 00004042 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 35212 00004044 0036[6148]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35213 00004048 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 35214                                  got_key:
 35215 0000404A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35216 0000404B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35217 0000404E 8706[6048]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35218 00004052 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35219 00004054 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35220 00004056 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35221 00004057 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35222 0000405A 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35223 0000405E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35224 00004061 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35225 00004063 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 35226                                  
 35227                                  timeout_disabled:
 35228 00004064 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35229 00004065 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35230 00004067 7555                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35231 00004069 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35232 0000406B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35233                                  
 35234 0000406D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35235 0000406F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 35236 00004071 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35237 00004074 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35238 00004076 FE0E[5C48]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35239 0000407A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35240 0000407D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35241 0000407F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 35242                                  not_up:
 35243 00004081 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35244 00004083 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 35245 00004085 3A1E[5D48]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35246 00004089 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35247 0000408B FE06[5C48]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35248 0000408F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35249 00004092 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35250                                  print1: 
 35251 00004093 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 35252                                  print2: 
 35253 00004095 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 35254 00004098 E85E00                          call    disp_num        ;
 35255                                  to_input_key:
 35256 0000409B EB86                            jmp     input_key       ;
 35257                                  not_down:
 35258 0000409D F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35259 000040A2 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35260 000040A4 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35261 000040A6 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 35262 000040A8 8036[5B48]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35263 000040AD E85900                          call    show_status     ;
 35264 000040B0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 35265                                  not_f8:
 35266 000040B3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35267 000040B5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35268 000040B7 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35269 000040BA B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35270 000040BC EB26                            jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35271                                  
 35272                                  normal_key:
 35273 000040BE 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35274 000040C0 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 35275 000040C2 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35276 000040C4 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35277 000040C6 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35278 000040C9 C3                              retn			;
 35279                                  not_backspace:
 35280 000040CA 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35281 000040CC 76CD                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35282 000040CE 3A06[5D48]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35283 000040D2 77C7                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35284 000040D4 A2[5C48]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35285 000040D7 E84CFE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35286 000040DA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35287 000040DC EBB7                            jmp	short print2
 35288                                  
 35289                                  select_done:
 35290 000040DE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35291 000040E0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 35292 000040E2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35293                                  
 35294                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35295                                  
 35296                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35297                                  
 35298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35299                                  ;
 35300                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35301                                  ;
 35302                                  ;   INPUT
 35303                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35304                                  ;
 35305                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35306                                  ;       None
 35307                                  ;
 35308                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35309                                  ;       None
 35310                                  ;
 35311                                  ;   NOTES
 35312                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35313                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35314                                  ;
 35315                                  ;   HISTORY
 35316                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35317                                  ;
 35318                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35319                                  
 35320                                  disp_input:
 35321 000040E4 50                              push    ax
 35322 000040E5 3C20                            cmp     al,' '
 35323 000040E7 7302                            jae	short disp_ok
 35324 000040E9 B020                            mov     al,' '
 35325                                  disp_ok:
 35326 000040EB 88C2                            mov     dl,al
 35327 000040ED B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35328 000040EF CD21                            int     21h
 35329 000040F1 BA[764B]                        mov     dx,crlfm
 35330 000040F4 E83205                          call    print
 35331 000040F7 58                              pop     ax
 35332 000040F8 C3                              retn
 35333                                  
 35334                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35335                                  
 35336                                  disp_num:
 35337 000040F9 53                              push    bx
 35338 000040FA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 35339 000040FC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 35340 000040FE 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35341 00004102 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 35342 00004105 CD10                            int     10h
 35343 00004107 5B                              pop     bx
 35344 00004108 C3                              retn
 35345                                  
 35346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35347                                  ;
 35348                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   INPUT
 35351                                  ;       None
 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35354                                  ;       None
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35357                                  ;       None
 35358                                  ;
 35359                                  ;   NOTES
 35360                                  ;       None
 35361                                  ;
 35362                                  ;   HISTORY
 35363                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35364                                  ;
 35365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35366                                  
 35367                                  show_status:
 35368 00004109 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35369 0000410A 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35370 0000410E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35371 00004110 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35372 00004112 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35373 00004113 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35374 00004115 8B16[5548]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35375 00004119 F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35376 0000411E 740E                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35377 00004120 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 35378 00004122 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35379 00004124 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35380 00004127 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35381 0000412A CD10                            int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35382 0000412C EB13                            jmp     short show_done ;
 35383                                  show_onoff: 
 35384 0000412E CD10                            int     10h
 35385                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35386                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35387                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35388                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35389                                  
 35390 00004130 A0[124E]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35391 00004133 803E[5B48]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35392 00004138 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 35393 0000413A A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35394                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35395 0000413D B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35396 0000413F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35397                                  show_done:                      ;
 35398 00004141 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35399 00004142 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35400 00004144 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35401 00004146 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35402 00004147 C3                              retn			;
 35403                                  
 35404                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35405                                  
 35406                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35407                                  ;
 35408                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35409                                  ;
 35410                                  ;   INPUT
 35411                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35412                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35413                                  ;
 35414                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35415                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35416                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35417                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35418                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35421                                  ;       AX
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   NOTES
 35424                                  ;       None
 35425                                  ;
 35426                                  ;   HISTORY
 35427                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35430                                  
 35431                                  skip_token:
 35432 00004148 E85100                          call    get_char
 35433 0000414B 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 35434 0000414D E8B901                          call    any_delim
 35435 00004150 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 35436                                  skip_check_eol:
 35437 00004152 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35438 00004154 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35439 00004156 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35440 00004158 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35441 0000415A F8                              clc
 35442                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35443 0000415B C3                      	retn
 35444                                  skip_token_eol:
 35445 0000415C F9                              stc
 35446                                  skip_token_done:
 35447 0000415D C3                              retn
 35448                                  
 35449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35450                                  ;
 35451                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35452                                  ;
 35453                                  ;   INPUT
 35454                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35455                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35456                                  ;
 35457                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35458                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35459                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35460                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35461                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35462                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35463                                  ;
 35464                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35465                                  ;       AX
 35466                                  ;
 35467                                  ;   NOTES
 35468                                  ;       None
 35469                                  ;
 35470                                  ;   HISTORY
 35471                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35472                                  ;
 35473                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35474                                  
 35475                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35476 0000415E E83B00                          call    get_char        ;
 35477 00004161 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35478 00004164 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35479 00004166 E8B001                          call    delim           ;
 35480 00004169 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 35481 0000416B EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35482                                  
 35483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35484                                  ;
 35485                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35486                                  ;
 35487                                  ;   INPUT
 35488                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35489                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35490                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35491                                  ;
 35492                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35493                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35494                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35495                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35496                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35499                                  ;       AX
 35500                                  ;
 35501                                  ;   NOTES
 35502                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35503                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35504                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35505                                  ;
 35506                                  ;   HISTORY
 35507                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35508                                  ;
 35509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35510                                  
 35511                                  skip_opt_line:
 35512 0000416D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35513 0000416F 7409                            je	short skip_line_done
 35514                                       
 35515                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35516                                  
 35517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35518                                  ;
 35519                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35520                                  ;
 35521                                  ;   INPUT
 35522                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35523                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35524                                  ;
 35525                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35526                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35527                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35528                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35529                                  ;
 35530                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35531                                  ;       AX
 35532                                  ;
 35533                                  ;   NOTES
 35534                                  ;       None
 35535                                  ;
 35536                                  ;   HISTORY
 35537                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35538                                  ;
 35539                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35540                                  
 35541                                  skip_line:
 35542 00004171 E82800                          call    get_char
 35543 00004174 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 35544 00004176 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35545 00004178 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 35546                                  skip_line_done:
 35547                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35548 0000417A C3                              retn
 35549                                  
 35550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35551                                  ;
 35552                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35553                                  ;
 35554                                  ;   INPUT
 35555                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35556                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35557                                  ;
 35558                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35559                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35560                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35561                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35562                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35563                                  ;
 35564                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35565                                  ;       AX
 35566                                  ;
 35567                                  ;   NOTES
 35568                                  ;       None
 35569                                  ;
 35570                                  ;   HISTORY
 35571                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35572                                  ;
 35573                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35574                                  
 35575                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35576                                  
 35577                                  get_number:
 35578 0000417B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35579                                  num_loop:
 35580 0000417D E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 35581 00004180 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 35582 00004182 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35583 00004184 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35584 00004186 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35585 00004188 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 35586 0000418A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35587 0000418B B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35588 0000418E 52                              push    dx              ;
 35589 0000418F F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 35590 00004191 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35591 00004192 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 35592 00004194 58                              pop     ax              ;
 35593 00004195 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 35594 00004197 98                              cbw                     ;
 35595 00004198 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 35596 0000419A EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 35597                                  
 35598                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35599                                  ;num_done:
 35600                                          ;retn
 35601                                  
 35602                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35603                                  ;
 35604                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35605                                  ;
 35606                                  ;   INPUT
 35607                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35608                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35609                                  ;
 35610                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35611                                  ;       AL == next character
 35612                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35613                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35614                                  ;
 35615                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35616                                  ;       AX
 35617                                  ;
 35618                                  ;   NOTES
 35619                                  ;       None
 35620                                  ;
 35621                                  ;   HISTORY
 35622                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35623                                  ;
 35624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35625                                  
 35626                                  get_char:
 35627 0000419C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35628 0000419F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35629                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35630 000041A1 26                      	es	
 35631 000041A2 AC                      	lodsb
 35632 000041A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 35633 000041A5 C3                              retn			;
 35634                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35635 000041A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35636                                  nearby_ret:
 35637 000041A9 C3                              retn
 35638                                  
 35639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35640                                  ;
 35641                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35642                                  ;
 35643                                  ;   INPUT
 35644                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35645                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35646                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35647                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35648                                  ;
 35649                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35650                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35651                                  ;
 35652                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35653                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35654                                  ;
 35655                                  ;   NOTES
 35656                                  ;       None
 35657                                  ;
 35658                                  ;   HISTORY
 35659                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35660                                  ;
 35661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35662                                  
 35663                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35664                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 35665                                  
 35666                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35667                                  query_user:
 35668 000041AA F606[5B48]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35669                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35670 000041AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 35671 000041B1 E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 35672                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35673                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35674                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 35675                                  qu_1:
 35676 000041B4 F606[5B48]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35677 000041B9 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35678 000041BB 50                              push    ax                      ;
 35679 000041BC A0[DF14]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35680 000041BF F606[5B48]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35681 000041C4 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35682 000041C6 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35683                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35684 000041C8 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 35685                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35686                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35687                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35688                                  
 35689                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35690 000041CA 58                      	pop	ax
 35691 000041CB C3                      	retn
 35692                                  
 35693                                  query_all:
 35694                                  
 35695                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35696                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35697                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35698                                  
 35699 000041CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35700 000041CD BA[684E]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35701 000041D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35702 000041D2 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35703                                  
 35704 000041D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35705 000041D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35706 000041D8 BF[A848]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 35707                                  find_match:                             ;
 35708 000041DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35709 000041DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 35710 000041DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35711 000041E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 35712 000041E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35713 000041E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35714 000041E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35715                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35716 000041E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35717                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35718 000041EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35719 000041EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 35720 000041F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35721                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35722 000041F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35723 000041F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 35724 000041F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 35725 000041F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 35726 000041F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 35727 000041FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35728 000041FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35729 00004200 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35730 00004202 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35731                                  cmd_notset:
 35732 00004204 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35733                                  line_print:                             ;
 35734                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35735 00004206 26                              es
 35736 00004207 AC                      	lodsb
 35737 00004208 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 35738 0000420A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 35739 0000420C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 35740                                  non_null:                               ;
 35741 0000420E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35742 00004210 7210                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35743 00004212 7506                            jne	short non_space		;
 35744 00004214 26803C20                        cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35745 00004218 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 35746                                  non_space:                              ;
 35747 0000421A 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 35748 0000421C B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35749 0000421E CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 35750 00004220 EBE4                            jmp	short line_print	;
 35751                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35752 00004222 BA[064E]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35753                                  
 35754                                  generic_prompt:
 35755 00004225 E80104                          call    print                   ;
 35756                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35757 00004228 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35758 0000422A CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 35759 0000422C 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35760 0000422E 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 35761 00004230 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35762 00004233 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 35763 00004235 A0[124E]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35764 00004238 800E[5B48]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35765 0000423D EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35766                                  not_func:
 35767 0000423F 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35768 00004241 3A06[124E]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35769 00004245 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 35770 00004247 3A06[0E4E]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35771 0000424B 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 35772 0000424D 803E[DF14]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35773 00004252 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35774 00004254 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35775 00004256 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 35776 00004258 800E[5B48]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35777 0000425D A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 35778                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35779 00004260 E881FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 35780 00004263 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35781                                  
 35782 00004264 3A06[124E]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35783 00004268 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35784                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35785 0000426A F8                      	clc
 35786                                  do_cmd:
 35787 0000426B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 35788                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35789                                  	; cf=0
 35790                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35791 0000426C C3                      	retn
 35792                                  
 35793                                  skip_cmd:
 35794 0000426D 58                      	pop     ax			;
 35795                                  skip_all:
 35796 0000426E B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35797 00004270 F9                      	stc
 35798 00004271 C3                      	retn

 35855                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35856                                  
 35857                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35858                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 35859                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35860                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35861                                  
 35862                                  disable_autoexec:
 35863                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35864                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35865                                  
 35866 000042A6 F606[5B48]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35867 000042AB 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 35868 000042AD F606[5148]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35869 000042B2 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 35870 000042B4 800E[5148]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35871                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35872 000042B9 810E[5B48]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35873 000042BF BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35874                                  dae_1:
 35875                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35876 000042C2 A0[9047]                	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35877 000042C5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35878 000042C7 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35879 000042C9 8A1E[9147]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35880 000042CD B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35881 000042CF 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35882 000042D1 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35883 000042D4 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35884 000042D7 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 35885 000042D9 881E[9147]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35886 000042DD 81C3[9247]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35887 000042E1 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35888                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35889 000042E2 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35890 000042E5 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35891 000042E7 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 35892 000042E8 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 35893 000042EA 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35894                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now

 35897                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 35929                                  any_delim:

 35936 00004315 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 35937 00004317 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG

 35943                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35944                                  delim:
 35945 00004319 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35946 0000431B 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 35947

 35949 0000431F 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 35950                                  
 35951                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35952 00004321 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35953 00004323 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 35954 00004325 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35955 00004327 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 35956 00004329 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35957 0000432B 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 35958 0000432D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35959 0000432F 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 35960 00004331 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35961                                  
 35962                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35963                                  
 35964                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35965                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35966                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35967 00004333 F8                      	clc
 35968                                  ;endif
 35969                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35970                                  delim_ret:
 35971                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35972                                  	; cf = 0
 35973 00004334 C3                      	retn

 35996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35997

 35999                                  
 36000                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 36005 00004344 1E                      	push	ds

 36007 00004345 06                      	push	es
 36008 00004346 1F                      	pop	ds

 36010                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36011                                  
 36012                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36013                                  
 36014                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36015 00004347 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 36016                                  ;else
 36017                                  ;	xor	si,si
 36018                                  ;endif
 36019                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36020                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36021                                  	;xor	si, si
 36022                                  
 36023                                  convloop:
 36024 00004349 AC                      	lodsb
 36025 0000434A 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36026 0000434C 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36027 0000434E 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36028 00004350 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36029 00004352 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36030 00004354 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36031                                  noconv:
 36032                                  
 36033                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36034                                  
 36035                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36036                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36037                                  
 36038                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36039                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36040                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36041                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36042                                  ;
 36043 00004357 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36044 0000435A 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36045 0000435C 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36046 0000435E 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 36047                                  check_eol:
 36048 00004360 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36049 00004362 7406                    	je	short convdone
 36050 00004364 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36051 00004366 7402                    	je	short convdone
 36052                                  ;endif

 36055                                  convdone:
 36056 0000436A 1F                      	pop	ds
 36057 0000436B 5E                      	pop	si
 36058 0000436C 59                      	pop	cx
 36059 0000436D C3                      	retn

 36123                                  calldev:
 36124 000043BA 2E8E1E[F51F]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 36125 000043BF 2E031E[F31F]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 36126 000043C4 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 36127                                  
 36128 000043C6 2EFF36[F31F]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 36129 000043CB 2EA3[F31F]              	mov	word [cs:DevEntry],ax
 36130 000043CF BB[6803]                	mov	bx,packet
 36131 000043D2 2EFF1E[F31F]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 36132 000043D7 2E8F06[F31F]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 36133 000043DC C3                      	retn

 36135                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36136                                  ;
 36137                                  ; procedure : todigit
 36138                                  ;
 36139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36140                                  
 36141                                  todigit:
 36142 000043DD 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36143                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36144                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36145 000043DF 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36146                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36147                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36148                                  	;clc
 36149                                  	;retn
 36150                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36151 000043E1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 36152 000043E3 F5                      	cmc
 36153                                  notdig:
 36154                                  	;stc
 36155                                  notdig2:
 36156 000043E4 C3                      	retn
 36157                                  
 36158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36159                                  ;
 36160                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36161                                  ;
 36162                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36163                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36164                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36165                                  ;
 36166                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36167                                  
 36168                                  getnum:
 36169 000043E5 53                      	push	bx
 36170 000043E6 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36171                                  b2:
 36172 000043E8 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36173 000043EB 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36174                                  
 36175 000043ED 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36176 000043EE 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36177                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36178                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36179 000043EF B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36180 000043F1 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36181 000043F3 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36182 000043F4 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36183 000043F6 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36184 000043F9 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36185                                  
 36186 000043FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36187                                  
 36188 000043FC E8BEE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36189 000043FF 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36190 00004401 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36191 00004403 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36192 00004405 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36193 00004407 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36194 00004409 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36195 0000440B 7417                    	je	short b15
 36196 0000440D 2E3A06[AC02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36197 00004412 7410                    	je	short b15
 36198 00004414 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36199                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36200                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36201                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36202                                  	;nop
 36203 00004416 740C                    	je	short b15
 36204 00004418 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36205 0000441A 7408                    	je	short b15
 36206 0000441C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36207 0000441E 7404                    	je	short b15
 36208 00004420 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36209 00004422 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36210                                  b15:
 36211 00004424 2EFF06[5403]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36212 00004429 2EFF0E[5803]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36213                                  b1:
 36214 0000442E 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36215 00004430 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36216 00004432 5B                      	pop	bx
 36217 00004433 C3                      	retn
 36218                                  badnum:
 36219                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36220                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36221 00004434 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36222                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36223 00004436 2EA2[AC02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36224 0000443A 5B                      	pop	bx
 36225 0000443B F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36226 0000443C C3                      	retn
 36227

 36229                                  
 36230                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36231                                  
 36232                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36233                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36234                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36235                                  ;	si = 0
 36236                                  ;	ax = country id
 36237                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36238                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36239                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36240                                  ;
 36241                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36242                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36243                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36244                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36246                                  
 36247                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36248                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 36249                                  
 36250 0000443D 57                      	push	di
 36251 0000443E 50                      	push	ax
 36252 0000443F 52                      	push	dx
 36253                                  
 36254 00004440 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36255 00004442 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36256 00004444 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36257 00004447 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36258 0000444A 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36259                                  
 36260 0000444C 06                      	push	es

 36262                                  
 36263 0000444E 0E                      	push	cs
 36264 0000444F 07                      	pop	es
 36265

 36267 00004453 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36268 00004456 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36269                                  
 36270 00004458 5E                      	pop	si
 36271 00004459 07                      	pop	es
 36272 0000445A 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36273                                  
 36274 0000445C 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36275 0000445F 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36276 00004462 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36277                                  
 36278 00004464 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36279 00004465 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36280 00004467 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36281 0000446A B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36282 0000446D E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36283 00004470 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 36287 00004478 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36293 0000447E 5F                      	pop	di
 36294                                  
 36295                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36296 0000447F 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36297 00004482 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36298                                  
 36299 00004484 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36300 00004487 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36301 00004489 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36302 0000448C 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36303                                  
 36304                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36305 0000448E 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36306 00004490 46                      	inc	si
 36307 00004491 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36308 00004492 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36309                                  
 36310 00004494 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36311                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36312 00004497 F9                      	stc
 36313 00004498 C3                      	retn
 36314                                  
 36315                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36316 00004499 5E                      	pop	si
 36317 0000449A 59                      	pop	cx

 36320

 36322 0000449E 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36323                                  
 36324                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry

 36328 000044AC B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36329 000044AF E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer

 36375 000044FD B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36376 000044FF F9                      	stc

 36378 00004502 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36379                                  
 36380 00004504 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx

 36400 00004523 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 36402

 36465                                  getcountrydestination:
 36466                                  
 36467                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36468                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36469                                  ;
 36470                                  ;input: al - data id
 36471                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36472                                  ;on return:
 36473                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36474                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36476                                  
 36477                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36478                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 36479                                  
 36480 0000456B 51                      	push	cx
 36481                                  	;add	di,74
 36482 0000456C 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36483                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36484 0000456F 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36485 00004572 47                      	inc	di
 36486 00004573 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36487                                  
 36488                                  getcntrydest:

 36493                                  
 36494 0000457F 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36495 00004582 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36496                                  
 36497                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36498                                  	;add	di,41
 36499 00004584 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36500                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 36502 00004589 F9                      	stc

 36504

 36507 0000458E 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1

 36511

 36519                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36520                                  
 36521                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36522                                  
 36523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36524                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36525                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36526                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36527                                  ;
 36528                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36529                                  ;	 be moved.
 36530                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36531                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36532                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36533                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36534                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36535                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36537                                  
 36538 00004599 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36539 0000459A B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36540 0000459D F9                      	stc
 36541 0000459E CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36542 000045A0 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36543 000045A1 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36544                                  
 36545 000045A3 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36546 000045A5 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36547 000045A7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36548 000045A9 F9                      	stc
 36549 000045AA CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36550                                  ricb_exit:
 36551 000045AC C3                      	retn
 36552

 36554                                  
 36555                                  set_country_path:
 36556                                  
 36557                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36558                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36559                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36560                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36561                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36562                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36563                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36565                                  
 36566                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36567                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 36568

 36584                                  scp_default_drv:
 36585 000045BD B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36586 000045BF CD21                    	int	21h
 36587 000045C1 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36588                                  
 36589                                  scp_setdrv:
 36590 000045C3 2EA2[B346]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36591 000045C7 BF[B646]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36592 000045CA 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36593 000045CC 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36594 000045CE 7404                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36595                                  
 36596 000045D0 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36597                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 36598                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 36599                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36600 000045D2 7501                    	jne	short scp_path
 36601                                  
 36602                                  scp_root_dir:
 36603 000045D4 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36604                                  scp_path:
 36605 000045D5 E81D00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36606                                  
 36607 000045D8 BF[B346]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36608                                  scpath_exit:
 36609                                  
 36610 000045DB 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36611 000045DC 06                      	push	es
 36612 000045DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 36613 000045DE 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36614                                  
 36615 000045DF 5E                      	pop	si
 36616 000045E0 C3                      	retn
 36617                                  
 36618                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36619                                  
 36620                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36621                                  
 36622                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36623                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36624                                  ;carry set if not.
 36625                                  
 36626                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 36627                                  
 36628 000045E1 50                      	push	ax
 36629 000045E2 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36630                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36631 000045E5 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36632 000045E7 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36633 000045EA 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36634 000045EC 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36635                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 36636                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36637                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36638 000045F0 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 36639                                  
 36640                                  cdletter_no:
 36641 000045F2 F9                      	stc
 36642                                  cdletter_exit:
 36643 000045F3 58                      	pop	ax
 36644 000045F4 C3                      	retn
 36645                                  
 36646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36647                                  
 36648                                  move_asciiz:
 36649                                  
 36650                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 36651                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 36652                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 36653                                  
 36654                                  masciiz_loop:
 36655 000045F5 A4                      	movsb
 36656 000045F6 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 36657 000045FA 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 36658 000045FC C3                      	retn
 36659                                  
 36660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36661                                  
 36662                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 36663                                  ;
 36664                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 36665                                  
 36666                                  badfil:
 36667 000045FD 0E                      	push	cs
 36668 000045FE 07                      	pop	es
 36669                                  
 36670 000045FF 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 36671                                  badload:
 36672 00004601 BA[B94B]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 36673 00004604 BB[764B]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 36674                                  prnerr:
 36675 00004607 0E                      	push	cs
 36676 00004608 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 36677 00004609 E81D00                  	call	print
 36678                                  prn1:
 36679 0000460C 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 36680 0000460F 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 36681 00004611 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 36682 00004613 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 36683 00004615 CD21                    	int	21h
 36684 00004617 46                      	inc	si
 36685 00004618 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 36686                                  prn2:
 36687 0000461A 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 36688 0000461C E80A00                  	call	print
 36689                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36690                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 36691 0000461F 803E[5303]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 36692                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 36693                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 36694 00004624 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 36695                                  	
 36696                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36697                                  	;call	error_line
 36698 00004626 E9ABE3                  	jmp	error_line
 36699                                  ;prnexit:
 36700                                  	;retn
 36701                                  
 36702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36703                                  
 36704                                  print:

 36706 0000462B CD21                    	int	21h
 36707                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 36708 0000462D C3                      	retn
